alert.note: Alert for Chisago (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 12 at 12:58PM CDT until May 12 at 1:15PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 115 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN CHISAGO COUNTY... At 1257 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Rock Creek, or 6 miles southwest of Pine City, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of northwestern Chisago County, including the following locations... Rush City Airport, Harris and Wild River State Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
